1111101110111010 0010100010111101 1 -> sum: 0010010001111000, cout: 1
0011001010110111 0000011011110011 1 -> sum: 0011100110101011, cout: 0
0000001101110010 0010111010010010 1 -> sum: 0011001000000101, cout: 0
0110101011000100 1000101001001100 1 -> sum: 1111010100010001, cout: 0
0011000111101011 0010010100001111 1 -> sum: 0101011011111011, cout: 0
1111000101010000 1000011011010111 0 -> sum: 0111100000100111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
